Class PlanboardMessageRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.repository.BaseRepository<PlanboardMessage>

  • public class PlanboardMessageRepository
extends BaseRepository<PlanboardMessage>
    Repository class for the PlanboardMessage entity.

        public PlanboardMessage findSinglePlanboardMessage(String usefIdentifier,
                                                   Long sequenceNumber,
                                                   String participantDomain)
        Finds a single planboard message given its business key: usef identifier of the connection group, participant domain name and sequence number of the document.
        Returns:
        a PlanboardMessage.

      • findPlanboardMessages

        public List<PlanboardMessage> findPlanboardMessages(DocumentType documentType,
                                                    DocumentStatus documentStatus)
        This method finds PlanboardMessage based on DocumentType and DocumentStatus.
        Parameters:
        documentType - The type of document, like request, offer or order.
        documentStatus - The status of document, like new, submitted or rejected.
        Returns:
        The list of PlanboardMessage which have a specific DocumentType and DocumentStatus.

      • findPlanboardMessagesOlderThan

        public List<PlanboardMessage> findPlanboardMessagesOlderThan(org.joda.time.LocalDateTime localDateTime,
                                                             DocumentType documentType,
                                                             DocumentStatus documentStatus)
        This method finds PlanboardMessage based on DocumentType and DocumentStatus.
        Parameters:
        localDateTime - The LocalDateTime the message should be before.
        documentType - The type of document, like request, offer or order.
        documentStatus - The status of document, like new, submitted or rejected.
        Returns:
        The list of PlanboardMessage which have a specific DocumentType and DocumentStatus.

      • findPlanboardMessages

        public List<PlanboardMessage> findPlanboardMessages(DocumentType documentType,
                                                    org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                                    DocumentStatus documentStatus)
        This method finds PlanboardMessage based on DocumentType and DocumentStatus within a time frame (startDate - endDate).
        Parameters:
        documentType - The type of document, like request, offer or order.
        period - The date of the planboard message
        documentStatus - The status of document, like new, submitted or rejected.
        Returns:
        The list of PlanboardMessage which have a specific DocumentType and DocumentStatus.

      • findPlanboardMessages

        public List<PlanboardMessage> findPlanboardMessages(DocumentType documentType,
                                                    String participantDomain,
                                                    String usefIdentifier,
                                                    DocumentStatus documentStatus)
        Finds all the planboard messages of a certain DocumentType for a given participant Optionally, a specific gridpoint and the DocumentStatus of the document can be specified.
        Parameters:
        documentType - DocumentType mandatory document type.
        participantDomain - String mandatory participant domain.
        usefIdentifier - String optional usefIdentifier of the ConnectionGroup related to the message.
        documentStatus - DocumentStatus optional document status.
        Returns:
        a List of PlanboardMessage.

      • findMaxPlanboardMessageSequence

        public Long findMaxPlanboardMessageSequence(DocumentType documentType,
                                            String participantDomain,
                                            org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                            String usefIdentifier,
                                            DocumentStatus documentStatus)
        Finds maximal planboard message sequence of a certain DocumentType for a given participant optionally, a specific USEF identifier and the DocumentStatus of the planboard message can be specified.
        Parameters:
        documentType - DocumentType mandatory document type.
        participantDomain - String mandatory participant domain.
        period - LocalDate mandatory period.
        usefIdentifier - String optional usefIdentifier of the ConnectionGroup related to the message.
        documentStatus - DocumentStatus optional document status.
        Returns:
        a Long maximal planboard message sequence, if there is no record in the table 0 value is returned .

      • findPlanboardMessages

        public List<PlanboardMessage> findPlanboardMessages(DocumentType documentType,
                                                    String participantDomain,
                                                    String usefIdentifier,
                                                    DocumentStatus documentStatus,
                                                    org.joda.time.LocalDate validFrom,
                                                    org.joda.time.LocalDate validUntil)
        Finds all the planboard messages of a certain DocumentType for a given participant. Optionally, a specific gridpoint and the DocumentStatus of the document can be specified. Optionally, a period can be defined.
        Parameters:
        documentType - DocumentType mandatory document type.
        participantDomain - String mandatory participant domain.
        usefIdentifier - String optional entity address of the congestion point related to the message.
        documentStatus - DocumentStatus optional document status.
        validFrom - LocalDate optional starting date of the period.
        validUntil - LocalDate optional ending date of the period.
        Returns:
        a List of PlanboardMessage.

      • findAcceptedPlanboardMessagesForConnectionGroup

        public List<PlanboardMessage> findAcceptedPlanboardMessagesForConnectionGroup(DocumentType documentType,
                                                                              org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                                                              String usefIdentifier)
        Finds all the PlanboardMessage entities with the given document type, for a given period and related to a given connection group.
        Parameters:
        documentType - DocumentType of the message.
        period - LocalDate period of the message.
        usefIdentifier - String USEF identifier of the connection group of the message.
        Returns:
        a List of PlanboardMessage.

        public List<PlanboardMessage> findPlanboardMessagesWithOriginSequence(Long originSequence,
                                                                      DocumentType documentType,
                                                                      String participantDomain)
        Find all the planboard messages of a given type for a given participant with the specified origin sequence number.
        Parameters:

        documentType - DocumentType document type of the planboard message.
        participantDomain - String participant domain.
        Returns:
        a List of PlanboardMessage.

      • findPlanboardMessagesWithOriginSequence

        public PlanboardMessage findPlanboardMessagesWithOriginSequence(Long originSequence,
                                                                DocumentType documentType,
                                                                DocumentStatus documentStatus)
        Find all the planboard messages of a given type for a given document status with the specified origin sequence number.
        Parameters:
        originSequence - Long origin Sequence Number.
        documentType - DocumentType document type of the planboard message.
        documentStatus - DocumentStatus document status.
        Returns:
        the PlanboardMessage matching the requested parameters.

      • findPlanboardMessages

        public List<PlanboardMessage> findPlanboardMessages(DocumentType documentType,
                                                    org.joda.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                                    org.joda.time.LocalDate endDate,
                                                    DocumentStatus documentStatus)
        Find all the planboard messages of a given type for a given document status with a time period (startDate until endDate).
        Parameters:
        documentType - DocumentType document type of the planboard message.
        startDate - LocalDate starting date of the period.
        endDate - LocalDate end date of the period.
        documentStatus - DocumentStatus optional document status.
        Returns:
        the PlanboardMessage matching the requested parameters.

      • updateOldSettlementMessageDisposition

        public int updateOldSettlementMessageDisposition()

        Returns:
        the number of updated entities.

      • findPlanboardMessages

        public List<PlanboardMessage> findPlanboardMessages(Long sequence,
                                                    DocumentType documentType,
                                                    String participantDomain,
                                                    String congestionPoint,
                                                    DocumentStatus... documentStatusses)
        Find planboard messages.
        Parameters:
        sequence - sequence number
        documentType - the documenttype (DocumentType)
        participantDomain - the domain name of the participant
        congestionPoint - congestion point entity address
        documentStatusses - one or more document statusses (DocumentStatus)
        Returns:
        A List of PlanboardMessage objects
